title: Yellow Fever Virus in Aedes albopictus Mosquitoes from Urban Green Area, Sao Paulo State, Brazil.
summary: We detected yellow fever virus by using quantitative PCR in Aedes albopictus mosquitoes and isolated the virus in C6/36 cells in 4 of 18 pools, including 118 specimens collected in an urban green area in Sao Paulo State, Brazil. ...
abstract: We detected yellow fever virus by using quantitative PCR in Aedes albopictus mosquitoes and isolated the virus in C6/36 cells in 4 of 18 pools, including 118 specimens collected in an urban green area in SÃ£o Paulo State, Brazil. Additional monitoring to detect shifts in transmission of this species is warranted.
